headline: Paint Maker PPG Sees Good News in Easing Car Insurance Premiums
summary: People are getting bolder about filing auto-insurance claims—good news for auto-body shops.  The company says that when the price of car insurance soared after the pandemic, more people were hesitant to submit claims for fear of seeing their rates jump even higher, or losing their coverage.  CEO Tim Knavish said in an earnings call Wednesday that the situation appears to be turning around as auto rates ease, though he didn’t expect PPG’s customers to resume normal buying patterns until the second half of the year.
